Articles.Content:
Hello!

I am now running Linux 64bit Kerbal Space program, so I am ready to make it look beautiful without worrying about memory usage. Can anybody suggest visual/graphics enhancing mods, preferably ones that play nice together? I have a good computer and I am down for anything; water/sky/planet retextures/kerbal retextures etc. I do know how to do searches, however I would love for somebody to give me somewhere to start before I dive in.

Any overhauls out there?
Take your pick from http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55401-Community-Mods-and-Plugins-Library. Especially the VFX section at the bottom.

Take your pick from http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55401-Community-Mods-and-Plugins-Library. Especially the VFX section at the bottom.

Now thats an awesome list, browsing now, thanks!

edit: Lol @ the forums censoring '$exy'. As if we aren't totally bombarded by $ex from our culture on a daily basis...

Now thats an awesome list, browsing now, thanks!

edit: Lol @ the forums censoring '$exy'. As if we aren't totally bombarded by $ex from our culture on a daily basis...

That noun is a perfectly fine one. Male ..., female .... ... chromosomes.

Oh well...

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/76972

This is a great collection. They are still working on updating to 1.0.2 but the effect they are achieving is next level.
